dict.acceptation: 泥土；土地，国土；滋生地，温床；粪尿，肥料；
弄脏，污辱；给…上粪（施肥）；被弄脏，变脏；用青草饲料喂养（牲口）；
变脏、受污染或玷污的；变脏；

sent.orig: Compare earth, ground, floor and soil.
sent.trans: 将earth、 ground、 floor、 soil这几个词作一比较。

sent.orig: Ginkgo adaptability to soil conditions, acidic soil, neutral soil or calcareous soil can produce.
sent.trans: 银杏对土壤条件适应性强、酸性土、中性土或钙质土均能生成。

sent.orig: The order of Df (desorption factor) value was: yellowish red soil>silt-loamy soil>kaoline>perlite>paddy soil (loamy clay) >kieselguhr.
sent.trans: 解吸因数的大小排列顺序为：黄红壤、粉泥土、高岭土、珍珠岩、青紫泥、硅藻土。

sent.orig: There is close correlation between soil microorganisms and soil enzyme activities, soil nutrients.
sent.trans: 土壤微生物数量和土壤酶活性与土壤养分密切相关。

sent.orig: Park from granite, gneiss, the soil is a gray forest soil, fertile soil, vegetation growing well.
sent.trans: 公园由花岗岩、片麻岩构成，土壤属灰色森林土，土质肥沃，植被生长良好。
